typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		InvoiceNo as integer '#######',
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as integer '#######',
		InvoiceDate as timestamp 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm',
		UnitPrice as double '#######.##',
		CustomerID as integer '#######',
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> InvoicesSource1
InvoicesSource1 sink(input(
		InvoiceId as integer,
		InvoiceNo as integer,
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		InvoiceDate as timestamp,
		UnitPrice as decimal(10,2),
		CustomerID as integer,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['Delete From Invoices'],
	mapColumn(
		InvoiceNo,
		StockCode,
		Description,
		Quantity,
		InvoiceDate,
		UnitPrice,
		CustomerID,
		Country
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InvoicesSink
